data.title: Hostages A Novel
data.meta_description: Garden City, New York: The Sun Dial Press, 1943 . Early Reprint. Hardcover with Dust Jacket. First thus. 8vo. Pp. 3 -362. Bound in full green cloth with heraldic device stamped in black on front board, black lettering stamped on spine. Top edge dyed green, fore-edge untrimmed. Former owner address label on the front pastedown. Dust jacket with edge-wear, shallow chips and spine a tad faded. Near Fine / Very Good-. Item
data.meta_site_name: Long Brothers Fine and Rare Books
data.text:
Garden City, New York: The Sun Dial Press, (1943). Early Reprint. Hardcover with Dust Jacket. First thus. 8vo. Pp. [3]-362. Bound in full green cloth with heraldic device stamped in black on front board, black lettering stamped on spine. Top edge dyed green, fore-edge untrimmed. Former owner address label on the front pastedown. Dust jacket with edge-wear, shallow chips and spine a tad faded. Near Fine / Very Good-. Item #6776

Early reprint of a propaganda vehicle that was quickly adapted to the screen: Prague, occupied by Nazis, is rife with intrigue. The drama was played on screen by Luise Rainer, Paul Lukas and William Bendix, Frank Tuttle directing. Rainer and Lukas are featured in the dust jacket photomontage.
